name: COVID19 Notifier - India
shortDescription: Covid19 Notifier India is a sample Android application built to demonstrate use of modern-android-development tools. Built with Kotlin, Coroutines, Flow, ViewModel, ViewBinding, Koin, WorkManager, Material Design and more modern development tools.
longDescription: Covid19 Notifier India is a sample Android application built to demonstrate use of modern-android-development tools. Built with Kotlin, Coroutines, Flow, ViewModel, ViewBinding, Koin, WorkManager, Material Design and more modern development tools.
